Summary: driving from NM to AZ--saw object in sky for 125 m
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hatch
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving from Albuquerque,NM to Tucson, AZ--out of Demming area--close to Arizonaborder--traveling West on I10--to my left over the flats and above a small peakI spot a large dull grey rectangle shaped something hovering--Its huge--the skyis clear--I look and look--thinking it HAS to be a balloon, ablimp---something--but this thing stayed there for 125 miles!!! Only little bylittle did I seem to get ahead of it--it morphed into a ball--white ball--and toa disc,k then to a heavy looking metal rectangle--I watched this thing for anhour and a half--it was not a plane--if there were ANY chance of it beingANYTHING else, I would concede, but I stopped and watched and watched this thingjust HANG there forever--finally it was just gone--just like that--one second itwas there--the next---nothing.I have NOOOO idea what happened. My cell phonedidnt work, but I figured I was in a dead-zone--I am on a business trip and Ibrought my lap top--it is acting up--weird weird stuff--telephones go dead in myhand for the past week--It seems like I have read peoples minds withoutthinking--and have pointed to a telelphone before it rings--notkidding--computers have gone down a lot at work-I have always had a problemaround electrical stuff--but its gotten reallly bad really fast...in my hotelroom--my coffee maker shorted out the first day I tried to use it--therefridgerator froze everything the first night and now is ok---people call me onmy cell phone and it doesnt ring for me --I dont know--now the lights are dimming as I writethis--?????????It could all be a coincidence....I have no idea--but I HAVEalways had problems with electrical stuff...?kat
